resources.string: Confirma la to cuenta de lichess.org, %s

string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Polsa nel enllaz pa activar la to cuenta:
Si nun te disti d\'alta, ignora esti mensaxe.
Resablez la to contraseña de lichess.org, %s
Recibimos una solicitú pa restablecer la to contraseña.
Si fixisti esta solicitú, fai click nel enllaz. Si non, ignora\'l mensaxe.
